DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study perform randomize prospective study evaluate whether vacuum erection device facilitate early return erectile function post radical prostatectomy . A secondary measure evaluate vacuum erection device help prevent penile shorten .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluating Effect VCD Erectile Function Penile Length Post RRP
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo radical prostatectomy prostate cancer able attain partial full erection preoperatively sexually active . Patients anticoagulation therapy bleeding diatheses Insufficient manual dexterity patient spouse IIEF ( International Index Erectile Function ) baseline < 11 , indicate severe erectile dysfunction
